mapper.select: SELECT t1.machine_id AS id, t2.machine_name AS NAME FROM ( SELECT machine_id FROM t_machine_shelf WHERE deleted = 0 GROUP BY machine_id ) t1 LEFT JOIN t_machine t2 ON t1.machine_id = t2.machine_id LEFT JOIN sys_tenant st ON st.id = t2.tenant_id WHERE st.tenant_name LIKE '%X'

SELECT ms.id, ms.shelf_index, ms.goods_id, gs.goods_name, ms.stock, ms.price, tm.tenant_id, st.tenant_name, tm.account_id, ts.store_name as name FROM t_machine_shelf ms LEFT JOIN t_goods gs ON ms.goods_id = gs.goods_id LEFT JOIN t_machine tm ON tm.machine_id = ms.machine_id LEFT JOIN sys_tenant st ON st.id = tm.tenant_id LEFT JOIN t_account_store ts ON ts.account_id = tm.account_id WHERE ms.machine_id = #{deliverId}
